title: Once Upon a Time
description: In the sensational third book of the Turn of the Tides series, Loslin and West are swept into a breathtaking turn of events. After developing their individual Gifts, they are well-prepared to meet the obstacles strewn along their path towards destiny. Will they be able to rescue their father, who remains in the grip of a powerful, evil king? Will they be able to stop the hands of time that spell either their doom or their ultimate triumph? Along the way, stunning new relationships are formed or revealed.
author: Christy  Newman
